src

Class ThreadedCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.ThreadedCounter

  • public class ThreadedCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a counter class that counts up to a specified number. It does so by utilizing multiple threads to count. No parameters are assigned to each thread, rather each thread races to count as many of the number up to the specified number as possible.

      • count

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> count(boolean verbosity,
                                                               int start,
                                                               int end,
                                                               int step)
        This function performs a counting operation by utilizing multiple simultaneously running threads.
        Parameters:
        verbosity - whether or not to produce output to console
        start - the starting value for the counter
        end - the ending value for the counter
        step - the step value for the counter
        Returns:
        a list of sets of values corresponding to the values counted by each thread
